item.description:
05:45PM: Sign-in
06:00PM: Potluck*
06:45PM: Announcements
07:00PM: DVD: Forks Over Knives featuring Drs. T.Colin Campbell & Caldwell Esselstyn.

Forks Over Knives examines the profound claim that most, if not all, of the degenerative diseases that afflict us can be controlled, or even reversed, by rejecting animal-basef and processed foods.

*Bring a raw/live, plant-based, organic dish to enjoy.
Experience the delicious variety of live raw foods.
http://www.meetup.com/RawBoston/pages/Potlucks

Dorothy Torrey, Alkaline Lifestyle Coach & Certified Wellness Cuisine
dorothy@PathtoVibrantHealth.com
508-888-6677
Cell: 508-280-3125
www.AliveWithWater.com
Ionized, alkalized, anti-oxidant, micro-clustered water & sanitizes

www.PathtoVibrantHealth.com  

FYI: We are a group of 15-35 people, who come to the potluck meetups  (either speaker of film) to have fun, share recipes and to have good conversation.  We welcome the curious, the transitional and the seasoned raw foodist.
item.how_to_find_us: Corner of Route 6 and Fort Hill Road.
item.name: Cape Cod Raw Vegan Potluck (E.Sandwich)
